name: The Unknown Abyss
description:
The Unknown Abyss Trailer
This Adventure 3D Maze game is based on the movie Bandersnatch. It revolves around you trapped in a demon's game, dying in this game will reset your whole progress. It is a branching decision-based story where the outcome of your journey will be solely based on the decisions you'll be making.
Link
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/@JehoiakimTaniegra/games
Itch.io: https://jehoiakim1010.itch.io/
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/JehoiakimTaniegraGames/
Sound Effects: https://freesound.org/ & http://ccmixter.org/people/_ghost
Scriptwriter: JM Lagrimas
Special Thanks: Joshua Baltazar
Controls 
WASD - Move
Left Mouse - Interact
Shift - Sprint
